sourcesContent:
import { createApp } from 'vue'
import App from './App.vue'
import {createRouter, createWebHistory} from 'vue-router'
import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"
import "bootstrap"
import SobreComponent from './components/SobreComponent.vue'


const routes = [
    { path: '/', component: App.HomeComponent, children:[] },
    { path: '/passado', component: App.PassadoComponent },
    { path: '/futuro', component: App.FuturoComponent },
    { path: '/sobre', component: SobreComponent },
    //{ path: '/Simulado', component: Simulado }
]

const router = createRouter({
    history: createWebHistory(),
    routes, // short for `routes: routes`
  })



createApp(App).use(router).mount('#app')
